html.p: The Data Security and Protection Toolkit is an online self-assessment tool that allows organisations to measure their performance against the National Data Guardianâ€™s 10 data security standards.

This Splunk App aims to support organisations that have access to NHS patient data and systems provide exidence that they are practising good data security and that personal information is handled correctly.

div.b: It is assumed that the following has been achieved to meet Ref.4.2.3 and Ref.6.3.3:

li.b: All indexes have been configured with at least 6 months retention
Data Encryption at rest has been enabled (Splunk Cloud Customers within an AWS Region only)
Security relevant log sources have been onboarded. Guidance can be sought from NCSC (https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/files/NCSC_SOC_Feeds.pdf)

search.query: | inputlookup evidence_questionnaire.csv | fillnull Value=NULL | eval status=if(Answer="NULL",0,1) | stats count as Total, count(eval(status==1)) as Completed | eval percentagecomplete=round(Completed/Total*100,2) | fields percentagecomplete
| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication

| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Endpoint.Filesystem by Filesystem.dest | rename Filesystem."*" AS "*" | append [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Endpoint.Processes by Processes.dest | rename Processes."*" AS "*"] | append [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Endpoint.Services by Services.dest | rename Services."*" AS "*"] | append [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Endpoint.Registry by Registry.dest | rename Registry."*" AS "*"] | append [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Endpoint.Ports by Ports.dest | rename Ports."*" AS "*"] | where dest!="unknown" | where dest!="127.0.0.1" | stats dc(dest)

| rest /services/data/indexes | join type=outer title [| rest /services/data/indexes-extended ] | eval retentionInDays=frozenTimePeriodInSecs/86400 | search title!=_* title!=lastchance title!=cim_modactions title!=history title!=main title!=summary title!=splunklogger | table title retentionInDays | rename retentionInDays as "Retention in Days"
